tldr: A prototype pollution issue was silently patched in version 11.2.0 of `@apidevtools/json-schema-ref-parser`.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges and if you are using $RefParserOptions.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@apidevtools/json-schema-ref-parser` library to the patch version.
